item.title: How to Open Files in the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Open a File: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Open a Window: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut How to Open a Tab: With Menu With Keyboard Shortcut With Click With Right Click No time to scroll down? Click through these presentation slides: Watch a video tutorial: How to Open a File With Menu Step 1: First open Notepad. Go to the upper left and click “File”.

item.title: How to Pin the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Pin Notepad to the Taskbar: With Search With Right Click From Start How to Pin Notepad to Start No time to scroll down? Click through this presentation tutorial: Watch a tutorial video: How to Pin Notepad to the Taskbar With Search Step 1: Go down to the taskbar and click the Start (four blue squares) button. Step 2: In the Start window that opens, click the top search bar and type “notepad”.

item.title: How to Open the Microsoft Notepad App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: What is Notepad? How to Open Notepad With Search No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Watch a video tutorial: What is Notepad? Notepad is a basic text editor that comes with Windows 11. This app creates text files for various applications, such as editing code or writing stories. Notepad can save files with UTF-8 encoding, and customize document headers and footers with special codes.
